title: Introducing -  OxiClean Carpet Stain Removers
description: Have carpet stains? Between mud, dirt and everyday spills, carpets go through a lot. But they don’t have to be ruined forever. OxiClean Carpet Stain Removers harness the power of oxygen to attack the toughest carpet messes, including red wine and pet stains. So you can get stains and odors out the first time.

asset.author: OxiClean

transcripts: New from OxiClean, OxiClean carpet stain removers. OxiClean Stain removers attacks the toughest carpet spills like red Wine and pet stains. The para oxygen removes tough stains. OxiClean carpet and area stain removal eliminates stains forever.
